theme.title: The 4/4 time signature. The whole note and its rest
theme.para:
In this lesson a new rhythmic pattern is introduced: One 8th note tied to group of one 8th and two 16th notes. Note that this new pattern can be written in two different ways:
Los acentos en esté compás se suceden de la siguiente manera: 1st parte fuerte, 2nd débil, 3rd semifuerte y 4th débil.
